control_attributes.Control: MA-4 (4) AUTHENTICATION / SEPARATION OF MAINTENANCE SESSIONS
control_attributes.control_description: The organization protects nonlocal maintenance sessions by:
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization ensures that non-escorted personnel performing maintenance activities not directly associated with the information system but in the physical proximity of the system, have required access authorizations.

Control Statement: The organization protects nonlocal maintenance sessions by:
Control Name: MA-4 (4) AUTHENTICATION / SEPARATION OF MAINTENANCE SESSIONS
